articles.title: NRL claims changes will mean faster games, stats reveal that may not be the case - ABC News
articles.description: The NRL is back tonight with changes that tout faster games and a better fan experience, but the ABC has taken a look at the stats and that may not be the case.
articles.content:
It'll be back to the future when the NRL resumes at Lang Park tonight, with just one on-field official in charge of proceedings for the first time in more than a decade.
